content.name: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child

primaryPhoto.description:
Love Harry Potter? Can’t get enough of the books or movies which shaped the minds of a generation? Then you’ll certainly want to catch HARRY POTTER AND THE CURSED CHILD at the Palace Theatre in the West End.
Based on original material by J.K. Rowling, Jack Thorne and John Tiffany, HARRY POTTER AND THE CURSED CHILD is the award-winning eighth story in the Harry Potter series – and the first Harry Potter story to be brought to life on stage.
This critically acclaimed production received its world premiere in the West End in summer 2016. HARRY POTTER AND THE CURSED CHILD remains the most awarded West End play in the history of the Laurence Olivier Awards. The production scooped a record‐breaking nine awards including Best New Play and Best Director in 2017.
Experience magic in every moment. Book your HARRY POTTER AND THE CURSED CHILD theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
